title: Add hamburger menu button to the right side of the header

requirements.text: Add a hamburger menu (☰) icon button on the right-hand side of the app header in App.tsx. The button should be visually styled to match the existing dark theme (neon-green accent, dark background). Clicking the button should toggle a slide-in or dropdown side menu panel. The menu panel can initially be empty or contain placeholder navigation items (e.g., 'Calculator', 'History') as a foundation for future expansion.

quotes: right hand side "☰" बटन लगा दो (यही मेन्यू होता है)

acceptanceCriteria: A ☰ (hamburger) icon button is visible on the right side of the header bar.
The button matches the existing dark/neon theme of the app.
Clicking the button opens a menu panel (side drawer or dropdown).
Clicking the button again (or a close control) closes the menu panel.
The menu panel contains at least placeholder items (e.g., 'Calculator', 'History').
The layout does not break on standard screen sizes.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
Maintain the existing dark neon theme defined in frontend/src/index.css and tailwind.config.js.
nonGoals: Implementing actual navigation or routing between pages.
Adding new calculator features or scientific mode.
